summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lumiere welcome screen feature. All functionality working perfectly across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports.
passed_tests: Welcome screen renders with phone mockup and floating provider icons
Chat bubbles display inside phone mockup with sample conversation
Welcome to Lumiere heading displays with cyan color (#22D3EE)
Intro text renders properly below heading
Get Started button is clickable and functional
Navigation from WelcomeScreen to SetupScreen works correctly
7 provider SVG icons visible in floating bubbles
Navigation functionality works on all screen sizes
